Date: 2025-02-12 11:57
Subject: RE: Commercial General Liability Insurance
--------------------------------------------------
Hi Roselle,

 

Can you send me a document of you what you are referring to?

 

We do take out a liability insurance for Chalhoub. However, this does not cover Etoile.

 

Please provide more details so that I can advise more accurately.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

Hi Hagop, 

 

Good morning and hope you are well. 

 

Could you kindly advise if Chalhoub stores have the CGL policy.

Previously, we had taken for The Galleria Al Maryah Island AUH stores during opening sometime in 2017 and would like to seek your advice if necessary to renew on top of TPL and PL.

 

Thanks to let us know your thoughts. 

 

 

Best regards,

 

Roselle Reyes 
Administration Coordinator I

 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/c9SRCR5EGUgvQl7T9fZT1zkoU?domain=etoilegroup.com>
